content: I'm glad I got the thumbs up for the Logitech C920. Since I've been doing well with my built-in laptop camera, I'm hoping the C920 will give me a noticeable upgrade in image quality. I'll definitely experiment with different camera angles and lighting setups to get the most out of it. Thanks for the tips on adjusting settings for each platform, too! Can you recommend any good software or apps for screen recording and video editing? I've been using the built-in software on my laptop, but I'm open to exploring other options.
